location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 2747/46 'Secret documents found among effects of the late Major-General Sir W Malleson'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains papers regarding a collection of secret intelligence reports, dating from c.1906-08, found in the effects of the late Major-General Sir Wilfrid Malleson. The primary correspondents are: Lieutenant-Colonel Vivian Malleson; India Office.
